title: Base font suggestion for this "Ilk" logo
content:
Need type suggestions to match this logo, certainly Italic Swashes... Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824051910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4471.gif)
author: Ryuk

comments.content:
Perhaps a Caslon swash (like Cabernet) with a bit of editing would get you similar results.

- Lex
Many thanks for this suggestion. I will try to make some tests with it. Hope I would have a little more suggestions.

You could also try a Bookman swash.

- Lex
